comment: I love this app soo much, I always check it in the day twice or thrice but nowadays whenever I open the app and see a nice pin I save it in my board and it's doesn't get saved. It shows 'Save failed' and whenever i download a pin that same thing happens so if I uninstall it would be not good so rather you guys fix it please ASAP!!!!
scenarios: The user opens the app, sees a pin, tries to save it to their board, but it shows 'Save failed'.
The user tries to download a pin, but it also shows 'Save failed'.
key sentence: The user opens the app, sees a pin, tries to save it to their board, but it shows 'Save failed'.
the function of activity: Activity involves searching, accessing menus, filtering, viewing various content categories, managing pins, profiles, settings, creating, sharing, and navigating within the interface.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Save Pin', 'description': 'Save a pin or item to a board for later reference.'}]
